Title: The Illusionist
Overview: With his eye on a lovely aristocrat, a gifted illusionist named Eisenheim uses his powers to win her away from her betrothed, a crown prince. But Eisenheim's scheme creates tumult within the monarchy and ignites the suspicion of a dogged inspector.
production_companies: Michael London Productions, Stillking Films, Bob Yari Productions, Bull's Eye Entertainment, Contagious Entertainment, Revolution Sun Studios
Cast: Edward Norton, Jessica Biel, Paul Giamatti
clean_text: illusionist eye lovely aristocrat gifted illusionist name eisenheim use power win away betroth crown prince eisenheim scheme create tumult monarchy ignite suspicion dog inspector fantasy drama thriller romance neil burger edward norton jessica biel paul giamatti 2006
